mapper.sql: id, name, sex, age, userName, password, image, driverCardNumber, driverCardNumberDate, remark, points, level
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
name,
sex,
age,
userName,
password,
image,
driverCardNumber,
driverCardNumberDate,
remark,
points,
level,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driverCardNumber = #{driverCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driverCardNumberDate = #{driverCardNumberDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driverCardNumber = #{driverCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driverCardNumberDate = #{driverCardNumberDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from user where name like "%"#{name}"%"
